data.title: The Los Angeles Film School
data.meta_description: The LA Film School offers accredited programs in Animation, Audio, Entertainment Business, Film, Graphic Design, Media Communications, Music Production, and Writing for Film & TV.
data.text:
The Spotlight Academy pays tribute to the heart, the creative and the dedicated among The Los Angeles Film Schoolâ€™s alumni. Each year, Academy Inductees are honored for their unyielding commitment to excellence in their professional career and selfless contribution of time and connection to our students and community.

Read more about the Spotlight Academy.

https://www.lafilm.edu/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/SPOTLIGHT_blog-josh.jpg 550 1100 webadmin3 https://www.lafilm.edu/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/lafilm-logo-2.png webadmin32024-08-12 09:31:552024-08-12 09:31:58Meet Joshua Gitersonke: Emmy Award-winning Cinematographer Behind The Amazing Race

https://www.lafilm.edu/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/simone-biles-rising.jpg 576 1024 webadmin3 https://www.lafilm.edu/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/lafilm-logo-2.png webadmin32024-08-09 08:31:242024-08-09 09:39:09L.A. Film School Alumni Behind Olympic Docu-series, Hit Shows, and Vegas Entertainment

https://www.lafilm.edu/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/2019-Primetime-Emmy-Awards-min.png 496 1100 webadmin3 https://www.lafilm.edu/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/lafilm-logo-2.png webadmin32024-08-08 10:16:072024-08-08 10:16:09The Los Angeles Film School Alumni Amass Credits on Nearly 300 Nominations Across 50 Projects for 2024 Emmy Awards

Kevin Atkinson

Kevin Atkinson made short films with classmates and learned how to operate film cameras as a student from the inaugural class at L.A. Film School. After graduation, Kevin found his niche in comedy sketches at Funny or Die with fellow alumni and Spotlight Academy member, Oz Rodriguez. Each production job he landed led to slightly bigger jobs in the industry.

https://www.lafilm.edu/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/ALUMNI-profilephoto_kevinatkinson.jpg 1334 2000 webadmin3 https://www.lafilm.edu/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/lafilm-logo-2.png webadmin32021-08-11 16:06:292023-12-12 12:55:23Kevin Atkinson

Daniel Zaidenstadt

Over his 10-year music career, Daniel has contributed to more than 30 RIAA Gold and Platinum albums and countless #1 hits. Daniel has worked with top artists like Bruce Springsteen, Lady Gaga and Zayn Malik. Daniel shifted from engineering to producing as heâ€™s grown in his recording career. Heâ€™s worked extensively with Zayn Malik and Carly Rae Jepsen as a vocal producer.

https://www.lafilm.edu/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/ALUMNI_profilephoto-danielzaidenstadt.jpg 1334 2000 webadmin3 https://www.lafilm.edu/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/lafilm-logo-2.png webadmin32021-08-11 15:28:352023-12-12 12:59:09Daniel Zaidenstadt

Angelina Faulkner

Angelina is an Emmy-nominated dialogue editor with a sharp ear for assembling audio with maximum punch and clarity. You can hear her dialogue work on the award-winning show What We Do in The Shadows. Her latest post-production work is on the animated show, Dunkcanville starring Amy Poehler.

https://www.lafilm.edu/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/ALUMNI-profilephoto_angelinafaulkner.jpg 1334 2000 webadmin3 https://www.lafilm.edu/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/lafilm-logo-2.png webadmin32021-08-09 14:33:232023-12-12 13:03:16Angelina Faulkner

Corey Drake

This '10 computer animation alum found his passion for animatronics while visiting Disneyland as a kid. With his heart set on working as an animator for Disney, Corey enrolled in the Animation program at The L.A. Film School.

https://www.lafilm.edu/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/ALUMNI-profilephoto_coreydrake.jpg 1334 2000 webadmin3 https://www.lafilm.edu/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/lafilm-logo-2.png webadmin32021-08-09 14:22:462023-12-12 13:04:45Corey Drake

Damian Szeibert

If youâ€™ve ever seen a Disney character collectible, you are likely looking at Damian Szeibertâ€™s work. Damian has devoted his career to bring characters from the silver screen into the homes of Disney and Pixar fans everywhere.

https://www.lafilm.edu/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/la_film_school_alumni_damian_szeibert.jpeg 1334 2000 webadmin3 https://www.lafilm.edu/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/lafilm-logo-2.png webadmin32021-03-14 16:47:582023-12-12 13:27:22Damian Szeibert

Jessica Sterling

Jessica has photographed some of the most recognizable faces in the world in her 10-plus years as a portrait photographer. Her work has appeared in MTV.com, The Huffington Post, Fortune and The Wall Street Journal. Jessicaâ€™s film and entertainment background led her to work in branding and promotion for top Hollywood talents.

https://www.lafilm.edu/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/la_film_school_alumni_jessica_sterling.jpg 1334 2000 webadmin3 https://www.lafilm.edu/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/lafilm-logo-2.png webadmin32021-03-12 17:05:122023-12-12 13:31:26Jessica Sterling

Henrique Andrade

Henrique sacrificed his free time to pursue his audio engineering career at Record Plant, which led him to work with iconic musicians like Justin Bieber, Zayn Malik and Carly Rae Jepsen. Henriqueâ€™s dedication to his creative pursuits has paid off with the success of each album he mixes or engineers.

https://www.lafilm.edu/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/la_film_school_alumni_henrique_andrade.jpg 1334 2000 webadmin3 https://www.lafilm.edu/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/lafilm-logo-2.png webadmin32021-03-12 15:14:202023-12-12 13:14:10Henrique Andrade

Oz Rodriguez

Over the years, Oz has worked on more than 50 episodes of SNL and directed the EmmyÂ®-winning show Creating Saturday Night Live, which documents the making of Americaâ€™s most iconic sketch comedy TV series. In 2019, Oz personally won a Primetime Emmy for Creating SNL.

https://www.lafilm.edu/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/la_film_school_alumni_oz_rodriguez.jpg 1334 2000 webadmin3 https://www.lafilm.edu/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/lafilm-logo-2.png webadmin32021-03-10 15:34:242023-12-12 13:17:55Oz Rodriguez
